page.title: 18MINIBEASTS 2
page.content: How we did it: The children went out to the different habitats and tried to collect Minibeasts. These were any animals smaller than an adult mouse that we could find. Many of the insects were difficult to identify. The weevil was called a Kiwi by some of the children because of its appearance. Many of the flying creatures proved ellusive and we had no access to a Night Moth Trap. The children of another class made insect traps so we didn't duplicate this work. We relied on stealth and swiftness of hand.
